attempts.output_sql:
WITH filtered_dates AS (
  SELECT
    d_date_sk
  FROM date_dim
  WHERE
    d_moy = 11 AND d_year = 2002
)
SELECT
  dt.d_year,
  item.i_category_id,
  item.i_category,
  SUM(ss_ext_sales_price)
FROM filtered_dates AS dt, store_sales, item
WHERE
  dt.d_date_sk = store_sales.ss_sold_date_sk
  AND store_sales.ss_item_sk = item.i_item_sk
  AND item.i_manager_id = 1
GROUP BY
  dt.d_year,
  item.i_category_id,
  item.i_category
ORDER BY
  SUM(ss_ext_sales_price) DESC,
  dt.d_year,
  item.i_category_id,
  item.i_category
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  dt.d_year,
  item.i_category_id,
  item.i_category,
  SUM(ss_ext_sales_price)
FROM date_dim AS dt, item, store_sales
WHERE
  dt.d_date_sk = store_sales.ss_sold_date_sk
  AND store_sales.ss_item_sk = item.i_item_sk
  AND item.i_manager_id = 1
  AND dt.d_moy = 11
  AND dt.d_year = 2002
GROUP BY
  dt.d_year,
  item.i_category_id,
  item.i_category
ORDER BY
  SUM(ss_ext_sales_price) DESC,
  dt.d_year,
  item.i_category_id,
  item.i_category
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  dt.d_year,
  item.i_category_id,
  item.i_category,
  SUM(ss_ext_sales_price)
FROM (
  SELECT
    d_date_sk,
    d_year
  FROM date_dim
  WHERE
    d_moy = 11 AND d_year = 2002
) AS dt, store_sales, (
  SELECT
    i_item_sk,
    i_category_id,
    i_category
  FROM item
  WHERE
    i_manager_id = 1
) AS item
WHERE
  dt.d_date_sk = store_sales.ss_sold_date_sk
  AND store_sales.ss_item_sk = item.i_item_sk
GROUP BY
  dt.d_year,
  item.i_category_id,
  item.i_category
ORDER BY
  SUM(ss_ext_sales_price) DESC,
  dt.d_year,
  item.i_category_id,
  item.i_category
LIMIT 100

SELECT dt.d_year
    ,item.i_category_id
    ,item.i_category
    ,SUM(ss_ext_sales_price)
FROM date_dim dt
JOIN store_sales ON dt.d_date_sk = store_sales.ss_sold_date_sk
JOIN item ON store_sales.ss_item_sk = item.i_item_sk
WHERE item.i_manager_id = 1
    AND dt.d_moy = 11
    AND dt.d_year = 2002
GROUP BY dt.d_year
    ,item.i_category_id
    ,item.i_category
ORDER BY SUM(ss_ext_sales_price) DESC
    ,dt.d_year
    ,item.i_category_id
    ,item.i_category
LIMIT 100

WITH branch1 AS (
    SELECT dt.d_year, item.i_category_id, item.i_category, ss_ext_sales_price
    FROM date_dim dt, store_sales, item
    WHERE dt.d_date_sk = store_sales.ss_sold_date_sk
        AND store_sales.ss_item_sk = item.i_item_sk
        AND item.i_manager_id = 1
        AND dt.d_moy = 11
        AND dt.d_year = 2002
        AND item.i_manager_id = 1
)
SELECT d_year, i_category_id, i_category, SUM(ss_ext_sales_price)
FROM branch1
GROUP BY d_year, i_category_id, i_category
ORDER BY SUM(ss_ext_sales_price) DESC, d_year, i_category_id, i_category
LIMIT 100

WITH sales_aggregated AS (
    SELECT dt.d_year,
           item.i_category_id,
           item.i_category,
           SUM(ss_ext_sales_price) as total_sales
    FROM date_dim dt,
         store_sales,
         item
    WHERE dt.d_date_sk = store_sales.ss_sold_date_sk
      AND store_sales.ss_item_sk = item.i_item_sk
      AND item.i_manager_id = 1
      AND dt.d_moy = 11
      AND dt.d_year = 2002
    GROUP BY dt.d_year,
             item.i_category_id,
             item.i_category
)
SELECT d_year,
       i_category_id,
       i_category,
       total_sales
FROM sales_aggregated
ORDER BY total_sales DESC,
         d_year,
         i_category_id,
         i_category
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  d_year,
  i_category_id,
  i_category,
  sales_2002_11_manager1 AS sum_ss_ext_sales_price
FROM combined_sales
WHERE
  NOT sales_2002_11_manager1 IS NULL
ORDER BY
  sales_2002_11_manager1 DESC,
  d_year,
  i_category_id,
  i_category
LIMIT 100

select dt.d_year
 	,item.i_category_id
 	,item.i_category
 	,sum(ss_ext_sales_price)
 from 	date_dim dt
 	,store_sales
 	,item
 where dt.d_date_sk = store_sales.ss_sold_date_sk
 	and store_sales.ss_item_sk = item.i_item_sk
 	and item.i_manager_id = 1  	
 	and dt.d_moy=11
 	and dt.d_year=2002
 group by 	dt.d_year
 		,item.i_category_id
 		,item.i_category
 order by       sum(ss_ext_sales_price) desc,dt.d_year
 		,item.i_category_id
 		,item.i_category
 LIMIT 100

WITH filtered_sales AS (
  SELECT
    dt.d_year,
    item.i_category_id,
    item.i_category,
    ss_ext_sales_price
  FROM date_dim AS dt, store_sales, item
  WHERE
    dt.d_date_sk = store_sales.ss_sold_date_sk
    AND store_sales.ss_item_sk = item.i_item_sk
    AND item.i_manager_id = 1
    AND dt.d_moy = 11
    AND dt.d_year = 2002
)
SELECT
  d_year,
  i_category_id,
  i_category,
  SUM(ss_ext_sales_price)
FROM filtered_sales
GROUP BY
  d_year,
  i_category_id,
  i_category
ORDER BY
  SUM(ss_ext_sales_price) DESC,
  d_year,
  i_category_id,
  i_category
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  dt.d_year,
  item.i_category_id,
  item.i_category,
  SUM(ss_ext_sales_price)
FROM date_dim AS dt, store_sales, item
WHERE
  dt.d_date_sk = store_sales.ss_sold_date_sk
  AND store_sales.ss_item_sk = item.i_item_sk
  AND item.i_manager_id = 1
  AND dt.d_moy = 11
  AND dt.d_year = 2002
GROUP BY

  item.i_category
ORDER BY

WITH sales_aggregated AS (
    SELECT dt.d_year,
           item.i_category_id,
           item.i_category,
           SUM(ss_ext_sales_price) as total_sales
    FROM date_dim dt,
         store_sales,
         item
    WHERE dt.d_date_sk = store_sales.ss_sold_date_sk
      AND store_sales.ss_item_sk = item.i_item_sk
      AND item.i_manager_id = 1
      AND dt.d_moy = 11
      AND dt.d_year = 2002
    GROUP BY dt.d_year,
             item.i_category_id,
             item.i_category
)
SELECT d_year,
       i_category_id,
       i_category,
       total_sales
FROM sales_aggregated
ORDER BY total_sales DESC,
         d_year,
         i_category_id,
         i_category
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  dt.d_year,
  item.i_category_id,
  item.i_category,
  SUM(ss_ext_sales_price)
FROM (
  SELECT
    *
  FROM date_dim
  WHERE
    d_moy = 11 AND d_year = 2002
) AS dt
JOIN store_sales
  ON dt.d_date_sk = store_sales.ss_sold_date_sk
JOIN (
  SELECT
    *
  FROM item
  WHERE
    i_manager_id = 1
) AS item
  ON store_sales.ss_item_sk = item.i_item_sk
GROUP BY
  dt.d_year,
  item.i_category_id,
  item.i_category
ORDER BY
  SUM(ss_ext_sales_price) DESC,
  dt.d_year,
  item.i_category_id,
  item.i_category
LIMIT 100

WITH sales_aggregated AS (
  SELECT
    dt.d_year,
    item.i_category_id,
    item.i_category,
    SUM(ss_ext_sales_price) AS total_sales
  FROM date_dim AS dt
  JOIN store_sales
    ON dt.d_date_sk = store_sales.ss_sold_date_sk
  JOIN item
    ON store_sales.ss_item_sk = item.i_item_sk
  WHERE
    item.i_manager_id = 1 AND dt.d_moy = 11 AND dt.d_year = 2002
  GROUP BY
    dt.d_year,
    item.i_category_id,
    item.i_category
)
SELECT
  d_year,
  i_category_id,
  i_category,
  total_sales
FROM sales_aggregated
ORDER BY
  total_sales DESC,
  d_year,
  i_category_id,
  i_category
LIMIT 100
